title: ESP32-based development board packs AMOLED display
description: LILYGO new compact T-Display-S3 variant with a colorful AMOLED display. As other recent LILYGO products, this versatile development board is powered by a ESP32-S3 with wireless capabilities, up to 28x I/Os and battery support. This device features the same Espressif Systems processor and comes in a similar form-factor as the T-Display S3 Pro covered in […]
